jobDescription: trustaff is currently seeking an experienced PICU Registered Nurse for a 13-week travel contract.  The Pediatric Intensive Care Unit Nurse (PICU RN) is responsible for providing the highest level of medical care to critically ill and medically complex and/or surgical pediatric patients. The PICU RN provides intensive nursing care and continuous monitoring of breathing, heart rate, and blood pressure.  1+ year of recent PICU RN experience is required **Most travel contracts include:13-week contractsMultiple Shifts Available; Days & NightsGuaranteed Hours
